instagram.description:
It turns out that a steady stream of beautiful images of the places you go to and the things you see can be a pretty good way for people to find out where you are. We had a friend whose stalker tracked them across multiple states to their workplace from seeing an instagram post with the sign in the background. Jeez, right?
A good way to avoid this happening is to make your instagram private. To do that, you can go to your profile, select the button for more options, and turn on 'Private Account'. Now you have to individually approve people. Protip: never approve the fash.
